    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddSearchHandler

        CcddSearchHandler(CcddMain ccddMain,
                  CcddConstants.SearchDialogType searchDlgType,
                  java.lang.Long targetRow,
                  CcddEventLogDialog eventLog)
        Search database tables, scripts, and event log handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        searchDlgType - search dialog type: TABLES, SCRIPTS, or LOG
        targetRow - row index to match if this is an event log entry search on a table that displays only a single log entry; null otherwise
        eventLog - event log to search; null if not searching a log

      • CcddSearchHandler

                  CcddConstants.SearchDialogType searchType)
        Search database tables and scripts class constructor
        Parameters:

        searchType - search dialog type: TABLES or SCRIPTS

    • Method Detail

      • setEventLog

        protected void setEventLog(CcddEventLogDialog eventLog)
        Set the reference to the event log to search
        Parameters:
        eventLog - reference to the event log to search

      • searchTablesOrScripts

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> searchTablesOrScripts(java.lang.String searchText,
                                                                   boolean ignoreCase,
                                                                   boolean dataTablesOnly,
                                                                   java.lang.String searchColumns)
        Search for occurrences of a string in the tables or scripts
        Parameters:
        searchText - text string to search for in the database
        ignoreCase - true to ignore case when looking for matching text
        dataTablesOnly - true if only the data tables, and not references in the internal tables, are to be searched
        searchColumns - string containing the names of columns, separated by commas, to which to constrain a table search
        Returns:
        Search results list containing object arrays providing each match's location in the database tables or event log, the column within the location, and an extract for the located match showing its context

      • searchEventLogFile

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> searchEventLogFile(java.util.regex.Pattern searchPattern,
                                                                java.lang.Long targetRow)
        Search for occurrences of a string in the event log file (session log or other log file)
        Parameters:
        searchPattern - regular expression search pattern
        targetRow - row index to match if this is an event log entry search on a table that displays only a single log entry; null otherwise
        Returns:
        Search results list containing object arrays providing each match's location in the database tables or event log, the column within the location, and an extract for the located match showing its context

      • sortSearchResults

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> sortSearchResults(java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> resultsDataList)
        Sort the search results by the first (target) column, and if the same then by second (location) column. Array variable member references in the location column are arranged by array dimension value
        Parameters:
        resultsDataList - list containing the sorted search results
        Returns:
        Search results sorted by the first (target) column, and if the same then by second (location) column. Array variable member references in the location column are arranged by array dimension value

      • removeArrayMemberReferences

        protected static void removeArrayMemberReferences(java.util.List<java.lang.String> matches,
                                                  CcddTableTypeHandler tblTypeHndlr)
        Remove data type or macro search references where the match occurs in an array size column of an array member (the reference in the array's definition is all that's needed)
        Parameters:
        matches - list containing the search results for the data type or macro reference
        tblTypeHndlr - reference to the table type handler

      • createSearchPattern

        protected static java.util.regex.Pattern createSearchPattern(java.lang.String searchText,
                                                             boolean ignoreCase,
                                                             boolean allowRegEx,
                                                             java.awt.Component parent)
        Create the match pattern from the search criteria. If the allow regular flag is set then the search string is used as is. If the allow regular expression flag isn't set then a wild card match is enabled. A custom matching system is used: a question mark matches a single character and an asterisk matches one or more characters. This is turned into a regular expression to perform the actual match Get the regular expression search pattern based on the input criteria
        Parameters:
        searchText - reference to the table cell renderer component
        ignoreCase - true if the search is case insensitive and the search pattern is not used by the PostgreSQL search_atables() function (must be false for this case; the case insensitive flag is provided directly to the function instead of being included in the matching string)
        allowRegEx - true if the search text can contain a regular expression
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog; null to not display an error dialog if the search pattern is invalid
        Returns:
        Compiled regular expression search pattern; null if the regular expression is invalid
